data.text:
Peel Summer School​​ - July (2024)

REGISTRATION OPENS ON FEBRUARY 27 AND CLOSES JUNE 14

PDSB Summer School will be:

- offered as: In-person or Remote, or Online

- Online and Remote summer school will use the D2L Brightspace virtual platform

- In-person summer school will be at location chosen

- Classes will be from: Tuesday July 2 - Monday July 29, 2024

ClickHERE to access the list of Summer School courses for July 2024.

(1 = July 2 - July 15; 2 = July 16 - July 29; F = July 2 - July 29)

How to register for Peel Summer School:

​Students register themselves for Peel Summer School.

Go to the Louise Arbour S.S. home page -->https://louisearbour.peelschools.org/

Click on Students and then select the Student Web link.

Once in Student Web, login is on the left-hand side.

--> Student ID is your student number and password is the same you use to login at L.A., BYOD etc.

Follow the prompts to look up courses under the various tabs and register.

Click on the credit history tab on the left to see a list of your current courses to ensure you have the prerequisite for the course you are planning to take in summer school.

For more information, please visit: https://www.peelschools.org/summer-school

TDSB Summer School 2024 - July and August

Registration for Non-TDSB students will open Monday, May 6th at 10:00am.

Click here for information on how to Register You will be registering as a Non-TDSB Student

July Summer school information:

E-summer July registration deadline: June 2th by 12pm (LASS deadline)

July Summer School Session will run from July 2nd - July 26th

July Session Course Offerings

August Summer school information:

E-summer August registration deadline: June 24th by 12pm (LASS deadline)

August Summer School Session will run from July 31st - August 27th

August Session Course Offerings

Dufferin-Peel (Catholic Board) Summer School​​ - July (2024)

REGISTRATION IS NOW OPEN AND CLOSES JUNE 3rd (LASS DEADLINE)

There will be no walk-in registrations

DPCDSB Summer School will be offered In-person ONLY at the following locations:

Brampton: Cardinal Ambrozic CSS, Holy Name of Mary CSS, St. Roch CSS

Mississauga: Philip Pocock CSS, St. Francis Xavier CSS, St. Joseph CSS, St. Martin CSS

- Classes will be from: Tuesday July 2 - Monday July 29, 2024 from 8:00am - 1:30pm

ClickHERE to access the Summer School Registration information for July 2024.

ClickHERE to directly access the registration form

ClickHERE to access the list of Summer School courses for July 2024.

Course ends in 1 = 4 Week Full Credit Courses - July 2 to July 29, 2024

Term 1 Course ends in 1 or F(French) = 2 Week Half Credit Courses - July 2 to July 15, 2024 (CHV/GLC)

Term 2 Course ends in 2 or F(French) = 2 Week Half Credit Courses - July 16 to July 29, 2024 (CHV/GLC)

For more information, please visit their website foundHERE

TDSB Night School​​ - Semester 2 (2023-2024)NON TDSB Students

CLICK HERE to find instruction on how to register for TDSB Night School

Create an account using the Registration Form

Click HERE to see what courses are being offered

Deadline to register: Wednesday Jan. 17th 12pm

To register for a Continuing Education Credit Course, students must show proof of prerequisite earned. You are not officially registered into a course until you submit the required documents:

Educational Documents: Transcript, Report card, Mid-Term Report Card, or Credit Counselling Summary/Student Status Report.

All documentation must be uploaded to your eReg Profile. If no documentation is uploaded, you will be removed.

Log into your eReg account, click on My Profile, Scroll down to Support Documents and click on Upload Files, click on “Choose File” select the file(s) you want to submit, click on “Upload”, your documents are now uploaded to your eReg Profile.

Day school students must have their course request approved by their day school Guidance Counsellor. Students under the age of 18 also require Parent/Caregiver/Guardian consent. The Parent/Caregiver/Guardian consent form is attached to your course request email.
